title: Does placing hands in middle of thighs & not near knees in tashahhud impact prayer? assim al hakeem
transcript: check while sitting between the two prostrations and the sitting during the show I normally keep my hands right in the middle of my thighs and not close to the knees where they should be kept as I seen in your videos the prophets prayer so does this impact the validity of my prayer like keeping it in the middle of the thighs and not close to the knees no it does not impact the validity of your prayer because this is a Sunnah would it impact the reward the answer is yes because you're not following the Sunnah but the prayer is still valid without any problem in sha Allah
